titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cairo Genizah Fragment TS E2.71 (Cambridge)
titleStmt.sponsor: Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

availability.licence: This work is copyright Hayim Lapin and the Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution International 4.0 License.

note.p: Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers BQ 10:6-8

Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at http://jnul.huji.ac.il/dl/talmud/mishna/selmimnu.asp and at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C211267-C211268. Recto and verso are registered in reverse order
Dimensions: 29.4 x 25.7. Approximately 2.7 characters per cm.
